changepass.description: Allows users to change their password

message.success: You have successfully changed your password.
message.error: An error occurred while changing the password.

form.title: Password change
form.label: To change your password, please fill out the form below.

newpassword.empty: The new password cannot be empty.
newpassword.invalid: The new password does not meet the conditions.

input.equals: The new password must be different.

form.title: Login
form.label: Welcome to the server! To continue, fill out the authorization form.

form.title: Registration
form.label: Welcome to the server! Please complete the registration form to continue.

input.invalid: The password does not match the conditions.
